description:
Population Raster Palau  2020

Data Input: Household locations from 2015 Household listing and population at Enumeration Area level extracted from 2015 Population and Housing Census conducted by Palau's Bureau of Budget & Planning
Year Population Growth Rate of 0.6 % has been applied to update population up to 2020

Household locations vector layer transformed into a 100m resolution raster.
name: Palau_Population_Grid_2020
